body_html: The details mostly look good. Is there a reason you didn't use the absolutevalue Bijector to implement this class? It would take care of sampling and log_prob for you.
body_text: The details mostly look good.  Is there a reason you didn't use the absolutevalue Bijector to implement this class?  It would take care of sampling and log_prob for you.
body: The details mostly look good.  Is there a reason you didn't use the [absolutevalue Bijector](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/distributions/python/ops/bijectors/absolute_value_impl.py#L34) to implement this class?  It would take care of sampling and log_prob for you.
